Opening its doors from 13th August â 12th September 2024, the 6,000 square metre experience, will provide fans of all generations with the opportunity to step through a nostalgic and educational journey consisting of 10 exhilarating stations including a design centre, immersive museum, playground, gamer zone and Hot Wheelsâ¢ Lab.

Fans will be taken on an unforgettable journey through the colourful and exciting world of Hot Wheelsâ¢, starting with an introductory video in the briefing room, taking a deep dive into the history and culture of the brand, and a fun trivia quiz! An immersive museum and expo where visitors can enjoy an exclusive glimpse into the best of the Hot Wheels collections is up next including Hot Wheelsâ¢ legendary life-sized cars!

Visitors can then immerse themselves in the Gamer Zone, tailored for console enthusiasts and gamers eager to show off their skills. Moving on to the Design Centre, the latest technology is used to introduce vibrant colour and graphic projection mapping onto virtual cars, kids and adults alike can freely create and have their work projected on the venue walls! Before the Hot Wheelsâ¢ Lab provides an area for fans to play with the most popular Hot Wheelsâ¢ toys!"></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-02T12:00:00.000Z"></span><span Wheelsâ¢ City Experience will be opening at its first European venue, the B.E.C Arena, Manchester

Opening its doors from 13th August â 12th September 2024, the 6,000 square metre experience, will provide fans of all generations with the opportunity to step through a nostalgic and educational journey consisting of 10 exhilarating stations including a design centre, immersive museum, playground, gamer zone and Hot Wheelsâ¢ Lab.

Fans will be taken on an unforgettable journey through the colourful and exciting world of Hot Wheelsâ¢, starting with an introductory video in the briefing room, taking a deep dive into the history and culture of the brand, and a fun trivia quiz! An immersive museum and expo where visitors can enjoy an exclusive glimpse into the best of the Hot Wheels collections is up next including Hot Wheelsâ¢ legendary life-sized cars!

Visitors can then immerse themselves in the Gamer Zone, tailored for console enthusiasts and gamers eager to show off their skills. Moving on to the Design Centre, the latest technology is used to introduce vibrant colour and graphic projection mapping onto virtual cars, kids and adults alike can freely create and have their work projected on the venue walls! Before the Hot Wheelsâ¢ Lab provides an area for fans to play with the most popular Hot Wheelsâ¢ toys!"></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-06T12:00:00.000Z"></span><span UNLIMITED TASTING SAMPLES. NEW & IMPROVED LAYOUT. INCREASED SEATING. AND MORE DISTILLERS! An Aladdinâs cave of craft spirits await all that attend as craft distillers old and new unite to take you on the ultimate spirit filled adventure. Youâll be able to enjoy unlimited tasting samples as you work the room, with a choice of over 300 craft spirits including Gin, Rum, Vodka & More. Unlimited Tasting Samples? Yes, thatâs right! Walk the room and sample with a wide variety of craft distillers all part of your ticket fee. After all, how else were you going to find a new favourite with trying them? Like what youâve tried? Why not treat yourself to a full size drink, artisan cocktail or even a bottle. Fancy learning more? Join our immersive workshops and masterclasses lead by industry experts. Want to relax and have fun? Take a seat and let our bar team serve up delicious drinks guaranteed to seduce your taste buds. We are delighted to be the largest craft spirit festival of itâs kind, so for those looking to embark on the ultimate âspiritedâ adventure and celebrate all things âdistilledâ with the UKâs very best craft spirit producers, then this is most certainly The Craft Spirit Show for you. WHAT TO EXPECT: Each of the 40+ distillery and mixer brands in attendance have their own unique space from which you can learn about the backstories, production methods, botanical make up and tasting notes of spirits like gin, rum and vodka. Enjoy samples from each of the brands but plan your time wisely as with over 300+ craft spirits thereâs plenty to discover. Like what youâve tried? Then you can purchase a full size drink straight from the distillery, or even grab yourself a bottle to take home for your collection! Get hands-on with cocktail making workshops brought to you by leading spirit brands Learn about distillation methods and what makes brands unique by attending masterclasses, hosted by established and emerging distilleries. Enjoy a drink at our fabulous bars, including the Main Bar and Connoisseur VIP Bar. Opening its doors from 13th August â 12th September 2024, the 6,000 square metre experience, will provide fans of all generations with the opportunity to step through a nostalgic and educational journey consisting of 10 exhilarating stations including a design centre, immersive museum, playground, gamer zone and Hot Wheelsâ¢ Lab.

Fans will be taken on an unforgettable journey through the colourful and exciting world of Hot Wheelsâ¢, starting with an introductory video in the briefing room, taking a deep dive into the history and culture of the brand, and a fun trivia quiz! An immersive museum and expo where visitors can enjoy an exclusive glimpse into the best of the Hot Wheels collections is up next including Hot Wheelsâ¢ legendary life-sized cars!

Visitors can then immerse themselves in the Gamer Zone, tailored for console enthusiasts and gamers eager to show off their skills. Moving on to the Design Centre, the latest technology is used to introduce vibrant colour and graphic projection mapping onto virtual cars, kids and adults alike can freely create and have their work projected on the venue walls! Wheelsâ¢ City Experience will be opening at its first European venue, the B.E.C Arena, Manchester

Opening its doors from 13th August â 12th September 2024, the 6,000 square metre experience, will provide fans of all generations with the opportunity to step through a nostalgic and educational journey consisting of 10 exhilarating stations including a design centre, immersive museum, playground, gamer zone and Hot Wheelsâ¢ Lab.

Fans will be taken on an unforgettable journey through the colourful and exciting world of Hot Wheelsâ¢, starting with an introductory video in the briefing room, taking a deep dive into the history and culture of the brand, and a fun trivia quiz! An immersive museum and expo where visitors can enjoy an exclusive glimpse into the best of the Hot Wheels collections is up next including Hot Wheelsâ¢ legendary life-sized cars!

Visitors can then immerse themselves in the Gamer Zone, tailored for console enthusiasts and gamers eager to show off their skills. Moving on to the Design Centre, the latest technology is used to introduce vibrant colour and graphic projection mapping onto virtual cars, kids and adults alike can freely create and have their work projected on the venue walls! Before the Hot Wheelsâ¢ Lab provides an area for fans to play with the most popular Hot Wheelsâ¢ toys!"></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-11T12:00:00.000Z"></span><span content="https://schema.org/EventScheduled"></span><span itemProp="eventAttendanceMode" content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="BELLATOR CHAMPIONS SERIES LONDON ON 14 SEPTEMBER WILL BE HEADLINED BY MIDDLEWEIGHT WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP REMATCH BETWEEN JOHNNY EBLEN AND FABIAN EDWARDS

 

Bellator Champions Series London at the OVO Arena Wembley will play host to a huge rematch for the Bellator Middleweight World Championship as Johnny Eblen looks to defend against Fabian Edwards on 14 September

 

Tickets for Bellator Champion Series London are on sale at 10:00am 

 

The Professional Fighters League (PFL), the fastest growing and most innovative sports league, tannounced that Bellator Champions Series London at the OVO Arena Wembley on 14 September will play host to a huge rematch in the main event as undefeated Bellator Middleweight World Champion Johnny Eblen (15-0) will face-off once again with Fabian Edwards (13-3).

 

The two athletes previously fought at Bellator 299 in Dublin on 23 September 2023, where Johnny finished the fight via TKO in the third round and emotions flew high in the immediate aftermath. Since then, the American went on to pick up a win over Impa Kasanganay at PFL vs. Bellator: Champs vs. Champs for the Middleweight Super Belt, whilst Fabian bounced back with a unanimous victory against Canadaâs Aaron Jeffery this past March to earn his rematch.

 

Fight fans can purchase tickets for Bellator Champions Series London from 10:00am BST Thursday 20th June to witness Englandâs own Fabian Edwards try to win gold for the first time in his Bellator career in front of a home crowd.

 

âWe love bringing our shows to London as they always bring the energy, and they have some of the most knowledgeable fanbases in the world when it comes to mixed martial arts, so we knew we had to give them a world-class fight and we sure have delivered.â Said Peter Murray, CEO of PFL.

 

He continues: âOur Middleweight division is stacked with incredible athletes and tough fighters, and we know the winner on 14 September at the OVO Arena Wembley will be the best in the world at their weight class, and I canât wait to find out who will be left standing in the middle with their hand raised.â

 

Bellator Champions Series London will stream live in the U.S. on Max, and in the U.K. on DAZN beginning at 5 pm BST, while locally in the Republic of Ireland, the event will be aired on Virgin Media Television."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-14T16:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope itemType="https://schema.org/Organization"><span itemProp="name" UNLIMITED TASTING SAMPLES. NEW & IMPROVED LAYOUT. INCREASED SEATING. AND MORE DISTILLERS! An Aladdinâs cave of craft spirits await all that attend as craft distillers old and new unite to take you on the ultimate spirit filled adventure. Youâll be able to enjoy unlimited tasting samples as you work the room, with a choice of over 300 craft spirits including Gin, Rum, Vodka & More. Unlimited Tasting Samples? Yes, thatâs right! Walk the room and sample with a wide variety of craft distillers all part of your ticket fee. After all, how else were you going to find a new favourite with trying them? Like what youâve tried? Why not treat yourself to a full size drink, artisan cocktail or even a bottle. Fancy learning more? Join our immersive workshops and masterclasses lead by industry experts. Want to relax and have fun? Take a seat and let our bar team serve up delicious drinks guaranteed to seduce your taste buds. We are delighted to be the largest craft spirit festival of itâs kind, so for those looking to embark on the ultimate âspiritedâ adventure and celebrate all things âdistilledâ with the UKâs very best craft spirit producers, then this is most certainly The Craft Spirit Show for you. WHAT TO EXPECT: Each of the 40+ distillery and mixer brands in attendance have their own unique space from which you can learn about the backstories, production methods, botanical make up and tasting notes of spirits like gin, rum and vodka. Enjoy samples from each of the brands but plan your time wisely as with over 300+ craft spirits thereâs plenty to discover. Like what youâve tried? Then you can purchase a full size drink straight from the distillery, or even grab yourself a bottle to take home for your collection! Get hands-on with cocktail making workshops brought to you by leading spirit brands Learn about distillation methods and what makes brands unique by attending masterclasses, hosted by established and emerging distilleries. Enjoy a drink at our fabulous bars, including the Main Bar and Connoisseur VIP Bar. Prosecco & Beer also available."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-14T17:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope itemType="https://schema.org/Organization"><span has announced that YouTube sensations, Dude Perfect, are taking their wildly successful arena tour international with their Dude Perfect Panda-Monium World Tour. The 11-city European tour will take place this September and includes a date at the OVO Hydro.

 

Nominated several times for Pollstar Family Event of the Year, Dude Perfect â Tyler Toney, Cody Jones, Garrett Hilbert and twins Coby and Cory Cotton â brings their YouTube videos to life with laugh-out-loud antics to the stage and compete in crazy, trick-shot themed battles. The tour will feature some of the most popular segments from their award-winning âOvertimeâ series like Cool Not Cool and Wheel Unfortunate with Ned Forrester, and fan-favorite segments like Get Crafty and Top 10.
 

 âTaking our tour outside of the US and connecting with our fans around the world has been a dream of ours for a while now,â said Coby Cotton. âWeâre so pumped that the time has finally come and are looking forward to this first step in bringing our live show abroad.â
 

âHonestly, Iâve been winning so many battles against the guys in the US that it seemed like it was time to give them a shot on foreign soil,â said Tyler Toney. âI canât wait to beat them in front of a new crowd.â"></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-16T18:30:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope itemType="https://schema.org/Organization"><span content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="The Chaos Tour is Carsonâs first headline run since 2022âs The X Man Tour. Fresh off his Coachella debut, he will join the iconic Red Hot Chili Peppers on their âUnlimited Loveâ tour in May.

 

Released earlier this month, âoverseas,â his new single, amassed over three million combined global streams in the first twenty-four hours, marking his biggest streaming debut ever. XXL, VIBE, Rolling Stone and others named âoverseasâ as one of the best new releases. The Face observed, âhis voice soars over dirty, psychedelic synths in a way which feels strangely epic.â Hypebeast said, ââoverseasâ finds the rapper in his zone over an electric beat.â

 

Hailed as âgenuinely cool, risky, and relentlessâ by Pitchfork, A Great Chaos debuted impressively at No. 11 on the Billboard 200. It also won acclaim from industry giants like The New York Times, Billboard, Rolling Stone and Complex, as well as placement on several âBest Of 2023â lists, and earned praise from icons such as Jay Z, Drake, J. Cole, Red Hot Chill Pepperâs, Anthony Kiedis, and more.

 

Carson, known as X Man to his fans, has teamed up with Xbox to create the custom Ken Carson Xbox Seriex X. In addition, there will be 50 custom Xbox controllers and 5 custom Xbox Series X consoles. Fans who purchase the exclusive Xbox x KEN CARSON t- shirt, available at KenCarson.xyz, will be entered for a chance to win one of the 50 custom Xbox controllers. A custom Xbox Series X console will be given to a top fan across socials."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-17T19:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope in 2021, the Sci-Fi epic Blade Runner Live tour returns to the UK in 2024.

The 2007 Final Cut of Blade Runner will be presented on a vast HD screen, while Vangelisâ synthesiser-led score will be performed live by The Avex Ensemble in sync with the 1982 motion picture. Blade Runner Live is a brand-new way to experience this iconic film like never before.

The incredible soundscape score is one of the most defining of all time â heralded for both its 80s sound, but also its evocative and futuristic elements that have seen it become a staple of cinema sound composition.

The stylish noir thriller sees detective Rick Deckard (Harrison Ford) continue as Replicant Hunter following the escape of 4 Replicants from colonies whoâve returned to earth. content="https://schema.org/EventScheduled"></span><span itemProp="eventAttendanceMode" content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="Falguni Pathak, the undisputed queen of Dandiya music, is set to grace the iconic OVO Arena Wembley with her mesmerizing melodies and infectious energy. Born on March 12, 1971, in Mumbai, India, Falguni is a celebrated singer and performer known for her unique blend of traditional folk music with a modern touch.


With a career spanning decades, Falguni Pathak has become a household name, particularly during the festive season of Navratri, where her lively and soulful performances attract legions of fans. Her ability to infuse contemporary elements into traditional Garba and Dandiya tunes has earned her a special place in the hearts of music enthusiasts worldwide.

Falguni's journey to stardom began with her breakthrough album "Yaad Piya Ki Aane Lagi," which became a massive hit and catapulted her to fame. Her soulful voice, coupled with vibrant stage presence, has made her concerts unforgettable experiences. She is not only a talented singer but also an accomplished performer who knows how to engage and captivate her audience.


Having performed in numerous concerts and events globally, Falguni Pathak continues to be a musical icon, representing the rich cultural tapestry of India. Her upcoming performance at OVO Arena Wembley promises to be a spectacle, showcasing her timeless hits and leaving an indelible mark on the hearts of her fans. Prepare for an evening filled with joy, rhythm, and the infectious spirit of Falguni Pathak's music at the iconic OVO Arena Wembley."></span><span itemProp="endDate" UNLIMITED TASTING SAMPLES. NEW & IMPROVED LAYOUT. INCREASED SEATING. AND MORE DISTILLERS! An Aladdinâs cave of craft spirits await all that attend as craft distillers old and new unite to take you on the ultimate spirit filled adventure. Youâll be able to enjoy unlimited tasting samples as you work the room, with a choice of over 300 craft spirits including Gin, Rum, Vodka & More. Unlimited Tasting Samples? Yes, thatâs right! Walk the room and sample with a wide variety of craft distillers all part of your ticket fee. After all, how else were you going to find a new favourite with trying them? Like what youâve tried? Why not treat yourself to a full size drink, artisan cocktail or even a bottle. Fancy learning more? Join our immersive workshops and masterclasses lead by industry experts. Want to relax and have fun? Take a seat and let our bar team serve up delicious drinks guaranteed to seduce your taste buds. We are delighted to be the largest craft spirit festival of itâs kind, so for those looking to embark on the ultimate âspiritedâ adventure and celebrate all things âdistilledâ with the UKâs very best craft spirit producers, then this is most certainly The Craft Spirit Show for you. WHAT TO EXPECT: Each of the 40+ distillery and mixer brands in attendance have their own unique space from which you can learn about the backstories, production methods, botanical make up and tasting notes of spirits like gin, rum and vodka. Enjoy samples from each of the brands but plan your time wisely as with over 300+ craft spirits thereâs plenty to discover. Like what youâve tried? Then you can purchase a full size drink straight from the distillery, or even grab yourself a bottle to take home for your collection! Get hands-on with cocktail making workshops brought to you by leading spirit brands Learn about distillation methods and what makes brands unique by attending masterclasses, hosted by established and emerging distilleries. Enjoy a drink at our fabulous bars, including the Main Bar and Connoisseur VIP Bar. UNLIMITED TASTING SAMPLES. NEW & IMPROVED LAYOUT. INCREASED SEATING. AND MORE DISTILLERS! An Aladdinâs cave of craft spirits await all that attend as craft distillers old and new unite to take you on the ultimate spirit filled adventure. Youâll be able to enjoy unlimited tasting samples as you work the room, with a choice of over 300 craft spirits including Gin, Rum, Vodka & More. Unlimited Tasting Samples? Yes, thatâs right! Walk the room and sample with a wide variety of craft distillers all part of your ticket fee. After all, how else were you going to find a new favourite with trying them? Like what youâve tried? Why not treat yourself to a full size drink, artisan cocktail or even a bottle. Fancy learning more? Join our immersive workshops and masterclasses lead by industry experts. Want to relax and have fun? Take a seat and let our bar team serve up delicious drinks guaranteed to seduce your taste buds. We are delighted to be the largest craft spirit festival of itâs kind, so for those looking to embark on the ultimate âspiritedâ adventure and celebrate all things âdistilledâ with the UKâs very best craft spirit producers, then this is most certainly The Craft Spirit Show for you. WHAT TO EXPECT: Each of the 40+ distillery and mixer brands in attendance have their own unique space from which you can learn about the backstories, production methods, botanical make up and tasting notes of spirits like gin, rum and vodka. Enjoy samples from each of the brands but plan your time wisely as with over 300+ craft spirits thereâs plenty to discover. Like what youâve tried? Then you can purchase a full size drink straight from the distillery, or even grab yourself a bottle to take home for your collection! Get hands-on with cocktail making workshops brought to you by leading spirit brands Learn about distillation methods and what makes brands unique by attending masterclasses, hosted by established and emerging distilleries. Enjoy a drink at our fabulous bars, including the Main Bar and Connoisseur VIP Bar. Prosecco & Beer also available."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-21T17:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope itemType="https://schema.org/Organization"><span With a unique blend of traditional Punjabi beats and modern music styles, Jassa Dhillon has quickly become a favorite among Punjabi music enthusiasts worldwide.

The concert will feature live performances of Jassa Dhillonâs smash hits such as Pyar Bolda, Spain, Hulare, Yaad and Talja. Queen of British Soul Beverley Knight continues her triumphs celebrating her 50th this year, announcing two very special celebratory âhomecomingâ shows next September at Londonâs prestigious Royal Albert Hall and the newly refurbished Wolverhampton Halls in her hometown.

These new dates are added following phenomenal demand for tickets to her â50â tour with most shows of her biggest ever tour of the UK this autumn now sold out.

With knock out performances like this past weekendâs mainstage set at Radio 2 in the Park at Leicester, itâs not hard to see why: VIEW HERE

The â50â tour marks her milestone birthday as well as the release of her first new studio album in seven years âThe Fifth Chapterâ out September 29 on Tag 8/BMG.

Beverley Knight will be live here at The Civic at The Halls Wolverhampton in September 2024."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-24T19:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" Costello and Steve Nieve have announced a 15 date tour of the UK & Ireland for September 2024, playing selections from a songbook that is fifty years long and twice as deep.

The tour kicks off in Glasgow on September 5, includes the London Palladium on September 21st, and finishes with a four - night run in Dublin at Vicar Street. They also play Wolverhampton for the first time in 30 years!

See them live here at The Civic at The Halls Wolverhampton in September 2024 with support from Ian Prowse."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-25T19:00:00.000Z"></span><span content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="After multiple sell-out tours with his debut show, My Journey to Space, Tim Peake returns to venues across the UK with his hugely anticipated new show, ASTRONAUTS: The Quest to Explore Space.

 

With the help of extraordinary archive material and footage, matched only by his unparalleled storytelling, Tim will bring to life the awe-inspiring endeavours of those pioneering explorers we call astronauts.

 

There is nobody more qualified than Tim, as a longstanding European Space Agency astronaut, to celebrate the incredible achievements and historic human endeavour of space exploration.

 

From our first forays through to the vast potential of the future, Tim will recount stories from his own journey to space and bring to life many iconic and groundbreaking missions from the past. Heâll reveal what spaceflight is really like: from the wondrous view of Earth, living in weightlessness, the unique dangers and unexpected moments of humour, to the years of training and gruelling psychological and physical pressures an astronaut must endure.

 

The journey has only just begun... come and join Tim for this first-of-its-kind show, launching at a venue near you in 2024!"></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="Pixey, the Liverpool-based performer, self-taught producer and multi-instrumentalist, is the heir to a lineage of British pop music that is both anthemic and tender. She draws from and reinvents the far-flung sounds which defined her upbringing: the rousing choruses of Britpop, the off-kilter pop of Grimes and the dancefloor-defining instincts of The Prodigy, channelling those influences through a vision that is remarkably fresh. Though her love affair with music began as a toddler, it took a near-fatal viral illness which derailed her formative years to reappraise just how important music was to her life. When she had no control over her body, she could reclaim it by devoting herself to learning to write and produce while in recovery. Pixey introduced herself as a talent to be reckoned with when she released a trilogy of EPs, Colours and Free, Live in Colour and Sunshine State, which resulted in her signing to the tastemaking record label Chess Club (Alfie Templeman, Phoebe Green, Wolf Alice). Even following the triumph of 2022âs mini-album Dreams, Pains & Paper Planes and hit single âDaisy Chainâ, this is only a glimpse of this pop visionaryâs ambition for the year ahead."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-27T19:30:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope itemType="https://schema.org/Organization"><span itemProp="name" content="King B Praak is celebrated for his powerful and emotive voice that captivates hearts worldwide.

His latest musical hit from the film "Animal" once again showcases his unique talent and versatility. Following the massive success of his song "Filhall," which has garnered over 1 billion views on YouTube, and the popular follow-ups "Filhall 2" and "Mann Bharryaa," B Praak is set to bring his magic to the United Kingdom.

For the first time ever, he will be performing four spectacular concerts across the UK. Donât miss this unique opportunity to experience the musical sensation live and be swept away by the enchanting sounds of B Praak."></span><span itemProp="endDate" â

Sonic Symphony is an immersive live experience that celebrates more than three decades of music from SEGAâs iconic mascot. From the classic 8-bit and 16-bit tunes to rock and EDM songs, this concert will take you on a musical journey through the colorful world of Sonic the Hedgehog.

â

Relive your favorite Sonic moments, brought to life by a full symphony orchestra. Sonic Symphony will be an electrifying tribute to the music that has defined generations of gamers, old and new.

content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="Death is an uncomfortable topic that most people avoid thinking about, but MOTHICA decides to dance with it. Vulnerably, she laments her personal battles with depression, addiction, suicidal ideation, processing her pain with lush soundscapes underpinned by funereal keys, heart-thumping hard rock guitars, and disarmingly catchy moments of pop catharsis.

After amassing hundreds of millions of streams and earning acclaim from the likes of Billboard, MTV, Teen Vogue, Buzzfeed, Alt Press, and more, she dives deeper into her powerful story with an audio/visual experience for her third album, KISSING DEATH, released through her own imprint Heavy Heart Records partnering with Rise Records/BMG.

âFor my whole life, Iâve romanticized death,â she states. âIn the back of my mind, suicide seemed like a natural and easy solution. When my thoughts get dark, I remind myself that we have an infinite amount of time to ânot exist.â For the small sliver Iâm here, itâs important to soak up every second and make the most of it. Itâs scary to surrender to the unknown, but itâs powerful to not give into my toxic vices anymoreâ.â

Born in Oklahoma, she moved to Brooklyn, New York for art school, and is now based in Los Angeles. In 2015, she started independently releasing music, taking a full-on DIY approach utilizing her background as an illustrator and graphic designer to design her own merch and creative direct her music videos. Her story has unfolded across her first two albums, Blue Hour [2020], and NOCTURNAL [2022]. She emerges as the rare creative chameleon who jumps genres from electronic music, left-of-center pop, and recently exploring rock/metal influences, collaborating with Polyphia, Scene Queen and Papa Roach.

Some career highlights include: her independently released âVICESâ which skyrocketed to no. 2 on the Pop iTunes chart in 2020, her song âBuzzkillâ about sexual assault with over 51 million Spotify streams and her rendition of Bring Me The Horizonâs âCan You Feel My Heartâ is a crowd favorite with 25 million Spotify streams. In the last year, she toured North America and Europe with Coheed & Cambria and Halestorm, in addition to various festivals.

Over the last two years, she assembled her most ambitious vision to date with KISSING DEATH, a visual album that tells an immersive story across 12 tracks and their accompanying music videos. âI decided to make the Grim Reaper a love interest in a dark rom-com-style tale,â she notes. âThroughout the visuals, Iâm seen in a therapist's office explaining this complicated relationship as if describing a scorned lover. The videos unfold a surrealist version of my life story.â

âI thought, âHow do I cope with the fact I embrace life so much now that I have a fear of losing it?â Thereâs a bit of dark humor, because I wanted to artistically portray what itâs like to live with this shadow following me.â She leaves off, âIf you have struggled with depression, anxiety, or addiction, you can listen to this and maybe find pieces of your own story.â"></span><span content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="POND, one of the most versatile, inquisitive, and accomplished bands in the psychedelic rock vanguard, have announced touring dates spanning several continents in 2024, plus teased a year of new music on the way.

Made up of Nicholas Allbrook, Jay Watson, Joseph Ryan, James Ireland, and Jamie Terry, Pond hails from Fremantle, Western Australia where the group formed in 2010. However, it wasnât until the release of their 2013 record âBeard, Wives, Denimâ that POND went from a group of musicians and friends to an internationally touring band. Today, POND boasts an impressive catalog of recorded music, spanning 9 critically-acclaimed albums with no plans of stopping now.

Since its beginnings, PONDâs prowess in the live arena has also been well documented. Pond has shared the stage with artists such as Flaming Lips, Queens of the Stone Age, Tame Impala and more. They have also been on major festival lineups worldwide like Glastonbury, Coachella, Splendour in the Grass, and the Great Escape."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="For decades the bright lights of New York have drawn artists to its storied city streets â those

seeking their tribe, those looking to solidify their identity, and those hungry for inspiration and fresh

encounters, all there for the taking on this new, broadened horizon. And now 26-year-old Ryan

Kaiser has joined those ranks, moving from Nashville to Brooklyn, at the tail-end of 2022. Except,

unlike so many who have come before him, Kaiserâs already made a name for himself creating

daydreamy, sun-blasted, Polaroid-pop as Yot Club.

With Yot Clubâs second full-length, Rufus, Kaiser is expanding his sonic palette and challenging his

own established modes of music making by letting collaborators in. The record includes co-writes

with the likes of Tommy English (Carly Rae Jepsen, Kacey Musgraves), and singers Charli Adams and

Harrison Lipton, with Patrick Wimberly (Lil Yachty, Joji, Blood Orange, MGMT

) on mixing duties, and the result is a collection of songs that sounds bolder and brighter. From the

shimmering surf-pop of opener âStuntman,â to the minor chord angst and quiet-loud-quiet pulse of

âNew Day,â to The Strokesian swoon of album closer âLazy Eyes,â Kaiser lo-fi hooks have a new

cinematic scope.

But letâs rewind to 2019 when his music first captured the ears and imagination of listeners thanks to

the song âYKWIM?â off his Bipolar ep, one of three EPs he released that year alone. Newly graduated

and still living in his college town of Hattiesburg, Mississippi, it was a pivotal year for Kaiser.

Seemingly out of nowhere the streams on âYKWIM?â started climbing: 500k streams a day soon

ballooning to a million. Unbeknownst to Kaiser, his song â which is now 2x RIAA Platinum â had

become a go-to sad song for nostalgia-centric TikToks. The virality didnât stem from a dance craze. It

was about a vibe.

The knock-on effect was every major label came calling, but for Kaiser, signing his music away for 25

years in exchange for an non-recoupable advance was a hard no. Ultimately, Kaiser signed with

Amuse, a distro company-turned-label, where he retained ownership of his masters and gained their

full support for his vision. Kaiser followed 2020âs Nature Machine EP with 2022âs Santolina EP, and

then, in 2023, he released his debut album off the grid and the EP amateur observer. Not to mention

a ton of loosies including âLAURENâ with spill tab, and âSafe Houseâ with Jordana, releases which

underscore his newfound explorations in collaboration.

Nostalgia is an oft-used descriptor too, but itâs one that Kaiserâs unafraid to lean into â âI donât like

anything that sounds like it was made now,â he notes â with his own song titled, âNostalgia,â

ringing out like the perfect soundtrack to a movie montage directed by John Hughes (with just a

pinch of The Postal Service). And then thereâs âDrowning,â written with Charli Adams, where

Kincaidâs razored guitars recall Bloc Party. With production credits including MGMT, Solange, and Lil

Yachtyâs latest LP, Patrick Wimberly mixing brings a different dimension to Yot Clubâs sound.

Thereâs an economy to Kaiserâs songwriting, a feel-it, sing-it straightforwardness that cuts to the

meat of the matter, with his titles often providing the jumping off point, like lead single âPixel.â With

its ticking urgency and cascading guitar line, it was written and recorded in two days with producer

Tommy English, and features Kaiser on live, looped drums, with additional slide guitar. âThat songâs

about getting caught up in your own life and technology in relation to self-importance and how you

see yourself,â offers Kaiser. âItâs never been harder to appreciate your own circumstances than it is

today because you can play the comparison game. Itâs a complicated dynamic: the people whose

lives look the best can often suck, âcos why else would they go to such efforts to make it look like their

lives are great!âThen thereâs âHuman Nature,â written with artist Harrison Lipton, who also plays in the band

MICHELLE and happens to live down the street. Written and recorded at Liptonâs parentsâ 100+ year-

old Connecticut house, Kaiser describes it as a driving-down-the-Pacific-Coast-Highway kind of tune.

But those sunny sonics belie the melancholic inevitability of so many splits: the lover you spent every

day with can eventually turn into someone you donât recognize at all. âThis album is not meant to

serve as an eloquent story where thereâs characters and side characters and betrayal and

heartbreak,â he says. âItâs just 13 separate episodes that restart and donât necessarily match each

other, but I wanted to give it a character to wrap it all together.â

Rufus is not exactly Ryan Kaiser, but these snapshots capture the essence of his experiences: a bad

relationship and fresh realizations; leaving it all behind to try and find footing in a shiny new city that

maybe isnât exactly the imagined, mythologized creative utopia. It continues Kaiserâs coming of age

â looking back, picking it all apart, trying to work it all out, and constantly pushing forward."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-09-30T19:30:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" strictly limited UK dates. As the beloved musical phenomenon enters its 39th revolutionary year in London, this spectacular production will have an extraordinary new design specifically created for larger venues with a cast and orchestra of over 65.

 

Les Mis will be performing in over 15 countries and regions worldwide including the UK, Luxembourg, Geneva, Milan, Trieste, Copenhagen, Oslo, Zurich, Sweden, Australia, Taiwan, Japan, South Korea and beyond, with more worldwide destinations to be announced.

 

Victor Hugoâs classic tale is an enthralling story of broken dreams and unrequited love, passion, sacrifice and redemption â a timeless testament to the survival of the human spirit. With a magnificent score of iconic songs including âI Dreamed a Dreamâ, âOn My Ownâ, âBring Him Homeâ, âOne Day Moreâ and more, this epic and uplifting story is undisputedly one of the worldâs favourite musicals.

 

Casting to be announced. content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="LES MISÃRABLES THE ARENA SPECTACULAR will embark on a World Tour from September 2024, opening with strictly limited UK dates. As the beloved musical phenomenon enters its 39th revolutionary year in London, this spectacular production will have an extraordinary new design specifically created for larger venues with a cast and orchestra of over 65.

 

Les Mis will be performing in over 15 countries and regions worldwide including the UK, Luxembourg, Geneva, Milan, Trieste, Copenhagen, Oslo, Zurich, Sweden, Australia, Taiwan, Japan, South Korea and beyond, with more worldwide destinations to be announced.

 

Victor Hugoâs classic tale is an enthralling story of broken dreams and unrequited love, passion, sacrifice and redemption â a timeless testament to the survival of the human spirit. With a magnificent score of iconic songs including âI Dreamed a Dreamâ, âOn My Ownâ, âBring Him Homeâ, âOne Day Moreâ and more, this epic and uplifting story is undisputedly one of the worldâs favourite musicals.

 

Casting to be announced. Les MisÃ©rables will feature a core cast with a great number of celebrated Les Mis guest stars appearing as their schedules allow."></span><span itemProp="endDate" Event Details
B.I is a South Korean musician, singer-songwriter, and record producer, signed under his own label, 131 Label. Since the release of his first solo album in 2021, B.I has been making creating a stir in the music industry through various achievements on a global scale. âIlla Illaâ from his debut album âWaterfallâ was the first K-pop solo male artist music video to hit 10 million views on YouTube within 24 hours of its release, with Time Magazine naming it as one of the best K-pop albums of the year. B.I is the first Asian and K-pop artist to perform for Grammy.comâs GLOBAL SPIN series.

B.I has always had a clear vision of the impact he wants to make with his music, which includes pushing the boundaries of Korean musicians from the category K-Pop to a more global platform. Working with the industryâs top professionals whose mission is to globalize Korean music while keeping an authentic identity, B.I hopes to bring the world together with his music. As a talented producer, he's produced sensational hit records for iKON during his tenure including 'My Type', 'Love Scenario', and 'Goodbye Road' garnering over 400 million streams on Spotify.

He has teamed up with award-winning producers such as the Stereotypes and top producer Cory Enemy. He has collaborated with artists such as rising stars Destiny Rogers and Tyla Yaweh for the global collaboration single, âGot It Like Thatâ, and along with Bipolar Sunshine and Indonesian artist Afgan, bridging the East and West for the song, âLost at Seaâ. Working with Grammy award winning producers like the Stereotypes and Nic Lee on his global album âLoved or Loved Part 1â he went on to release âBTBTâ with featuring from both Soulja Boy and Devita that has over 100 million streams as well as topping on Spotifyâs viral 50 regional charts was declared one of the top k-pop songs of 2022 by Times Magazine, NME, and Teen Vogue.  

B.Iâs second studio album set to release on June 1st âTO DIE FORâ illustrates the complete range of emotions we feel in our youth towards our dreams, love, and life. Some of these stories are told on his own, while others are shared together with artists from a myriad of genres including Jessi, Crying Nut, BIG Naughty, Kid Milli and Lil Cherry.

The coming album will be a story about youth and its most highlighted moments."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-04T19:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope strictly limited UK dates. As the beloved musical phenomenon enters its 39th revolutionary year in London, this spectacular production will have an extraordinary new design specifically created for larger venues with a cast and orchestra of over 65.

 

Les Mis will be performing in over 15 countries and regions worldwide including the UK, Luxembourg, Geneva, Milan, Trieste, Copenhagen, Oslo, Zurich, Sweden, Australia, Taiwan, Japan, South Korea and beyond, with more worldwide destinations to be announced.

 

Victor Hugoâs classic tale is an enthralling story of broken dreams and unrequited love, passion, sacrifice and redemption â a timeless testament to the survival of the human spirit. With a magnificent score of iconic songs including âI Dreamed a Dreamâ, âOn My Ownâ, âBring Him Homeâ, âOne Day Moreâ and more, this epic and uplifting story is undisputedly one of the worldâs favourite musicals.

 

Casting to be announced. itemProp="eventAttendanceMode" content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="BBC Studios and FKP Scorpio UK are delighted to announce that Planet Earth III Live in Concert is set to thrill UK audiences with special performances at London OVO Arena Wembley in October 2024. 

 

Following on from the critically acclaimed and successful Blue Planet II and Planet Earth II Live in Concert arena tours, the much-anticipated Planet Earth III Live in Concert will include specially selected breath-taking footage from the latest sensational television series produced by the multi-award-winning BBC Studios Natural History Unit will be shown in 4K ultra high definition on a gigantic LED screen. Playing alongside, the concert will feature the remarkable music score by Oscar winner Hans Zimmer, Jacob Shea and Sara Barone for Bleeding Fingers Music, performed by the fabulous City of Prague Philharmonic orchestra. 

 

Hans Zimmer commented: âCreating scores for any of the BBC's Natural History series is always an honour for me as there are no more epic stories than those occurring naturally every day in our own planetâs ecosystem.â 

 

This ultimate concert experience will take audiences across every corner of the planet from deserts and grasslands, through forests, along coastlines and into the depths of the ocean, with extraordinary stories of animal dramas that are thrilling, funny and sometimes heart-breaking. As always, the natural world continues to surprise, and this concert will show how animals are adapting in extraordinary ways to survive new challenges faced at this crucial time in history where humans play a central role.

 

The series itself was filmed over 1,904 days, in 43 countries and across six continents. Mike Gunton, the Executive Producer of the Planet Earth III television series says: âPlanet Earth III is about the resilience and adaptability of nature, and the remarkable animals that are changing their lives to meet the challenges of a rapidly changing world dominated more than ever by a powerful force: us. Itâs full of surprise and wonder but seen from a new perspectiveâ. Gunton will be the host of Planet Earth III Live in Concert. 

 

The London show will feature a matinee and evening performance at London OVO Arena Wembley on Saturday 5th October with the 2024. For the London matinee show, all children under 14 years of age will be entitled to a 15% discount per ticket."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-05T19:00:00.000Z"></span><span content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="Resounding and resonating across boundaries and borders, ONE OK ROCK consistently deliver unpredictable and unshakable anthems. Founded in Tokyo during 2005, the quartetâTaka [vocals], Toru [guitar], Tomoya [drums], and Ryota [bass]âhave unassumingly emerged as a global phenomenon and one of Japanâs hottest exports with dozens of international gold and platinum certifications and billions of streams. Beyond six consecutive Top 5 entries and three #1 debuts on the Japanese Top Albums Chart, the groupâs global imprint has grown with a foothold stateside. In 2017, AMBITIONS marked their debut on the Billboard 200, while 2019âs Eye of the Storm shot to #2 on Billboardâs Heatseekers Albums chart. They received honors at the Rock Sound Awards and the Alternative Press Music Awards. Joining forces with a cohort of A-list artists, the guys collaborated with Avril Lavigne, 5 SECONDS OF SUMMER, Kiiara, and more. They stand out as the rare force of nature who can tour alongside either The Smashing Pumpkins or Ed Sheeranâwith whom they co-wrote âRenegadesâ for the film Rurouni Kenshin: The Final. Unable to tour in 2020, the members of ONE OK ROCK worked for months to deliver a globally broadcasted livestream performance which is documented in the NETFLIX film Flip a Coin. Following nearly two decades of steady impact, they got louder than ever on their 2022 full-length offering, Luxury Disease [Fueled By Ramen]. Produced by Rob Cavallo [Linkin Park, My Chemical Romance], ONE OK ROCK continue to evolve on their own terms with stadium-shaking rock spirit and skyscraping hooks amped up on singles âSave Yourselfâ and âLet Me Let You Go.â"></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-11T19:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="British singer and songwriter, Becky Hill, is set to grace stages across the UK in October 2024 as she embarks on her biggest headline shows to date with a nationwide arena tour in support of her highly anticipated upcoming second album. With an irrefutable aptitude for writing chart-smashing dance-pop songs and a reputation as a leading force in the UK music scene, Becky Hill is without a doubt one of the UK's most exceptional talents, having secured two BRIT Awards, eighteen Top 40 singles (including the current hit âDisconnectâ) and billions of streams.

Playing arena shows across the country, this tour will mark an incredible milestone in Beckyâs career. The sensational live shows will once again showcase her incredible vocal prowess, captivating stage presence, and her ability to connect with fans in an unparalleled way. 

Becky says, âThis is my biggest tour yet! ARENAS HERE I COME!! I canât wait to play all my hits for you as well as tracks from my new album. see you there for a party!â

Becky Hillâs chart-topping journey has seen collaborations with some of the world's most renowned artists and producers and has ignited dancefloors and huge audiences this summer at festivals such as Glastonbury, Reading & Leeds, Radio 1's Big Weekend, Parklife, and TRNSMT. This tour announcement will certainly build excitementfor fans towards the release of her highly anticipated second album slated for release in 2024"></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="12th October 2024 will mark another night in history, A Night with The Compozers held at the prestigious OVO arena. Touring in arena venues around the globe with the likes of Asake & Davido, the full 360 of The Compozers headlining their next show at Wembley is a testament to their hard work, dedicated fan base and musical talent. The Compozers have consistently wowed audiences with their energetic and soulful performances, blending Afrobeat, R&B, Hip-Hop, and other genres to create a unique sound and atmosphere that resonates with music lovers from all walks of life. Setting the precedent from their iconic 10-year anniversary performance at The Royal Albert Hall, this edition of A Night With The Compozers will be a celebration of music, culture, and unity, bringing together people of diverse backgrounds for a night of pure musical magic."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-12T19:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="Icon, pioneer, and Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame inductee - Alice Cooper has achieved so much in his lengthy career. But most importantly, Alice Cooper remains one the greatest rock shows on the planet.

Returning to the UK for the first time since 2022, in October, Alice and his award-winning band are heading to Glasgow.

The Too Close For Comfort tour brings fans closer than ever to Alice with giant video screens blending the live action with pre-recorded scenes to delve deeper into Aliceâs world.

Expect spectacle - snakes, guillotines, monsters and more - wreaking havoc on stage nightly. Classics like âUnder My Wheels,â âIâm Eighteen,â âSchools Out,â âPoison,â âBillion Dollar Babies,â and âNo More Mr Nice Guyâ are staples and there are surprises every night, effortlessly drawn from one the greatest catalogues in rock and roll.

 

Fresh from the success of his latest album âRoad,â a concept album about the thrills and spills of touring, Alice is back, accompanied as always by his long-running live band of Ryan Roxie (guitar), Chuck Garric (bass), Tommy Henrikson (guitar), Glen Sobel (drums), and Nita Strauss (guitar).

âFor âRoadâ, I wanted the band to be involved in the foundation of all the songs,â says Alice. âI only see these guys when weâre on the road. So, I wanted them to be as tight as they are for the show but on all new material. When you have a band this good, I believe in showing it off, and this is my way of doing so.â 

Primal Scream, one of Britainâs best-loved rock bands, will join Alice for the tour, in all cities except London.  The Glasgow band have been on an odyssey, making jangly guitar pop to brash rock n roll, incorporating acid house and psychedelia into unique records and live experiences.  Frontman Bobby Gillespie cites Aliceâs shocking appearances on 1970s Top of the Pops as a formative influence.

In London, legendary Sex Pistols guitarist and songwriter Glen Matlock will be Aliceâs special guest. And on all dates, up and coming acclaimed punks The Meffs will support."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-14T18:30:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope Welcome to the biggest celebration of the music and life of one of the greatest singers of all time: Whitney Houston. Experience her remarkable musical repertoire with an arena-scale production that honours her timeless songs, with sensational vocalists and a full live band.

 

Prepare to be blown away by an extraordinary journey through three decades of all-time hits such as I Wanna Dance With Somebody,  One Moment In Time, Iâm Every Woman, I Will Always Love You, My Love Is Your Love, So Emotional, Run To You, Saving All My Love, How Will I Know, Million Dollar Bill, The Greatest Love Of All, and many more.

 

Join us for an unmissable evening, as we pay homage to the one and only queen of the night. 

 

Please note that Queen of the Night â A Tribute to Whitney Houston is a tribute production and is not endorsed by or affiliated with the Whitney Houston Estate."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="Star of stage and screen and singing sensation Jane McDonald will head to Glasgow as part of her new tour for 2024.

 

With All My Love will see Jane travel to more than 20 theatres and arenas across the UK â including a night at Glasgow SEC Armadillo on Wednesday October 23, performing the songs you love as well as new material penned by Jane herself.

 

Filled with love, glamour, and Janeâs warm Yorkshire wit, With All My Love is your opportunity to spend an evening with a national treasure.

 

Speaking about With All My Love Jane said: âOver the years, my fans have shown so much love for me and my music â and this tour is going to be my chance to give them a little extra love in return.

 

âThe thrill of a live audience is what I love most about being a performer and it always takes me right back to the early days of my career, so I cannot wait to get back on the road once more to sing for you all.â

 

Jane won the hearts of the nation in the BBC docusoap The Cruise back in 1998 and secured her reputation as a national treasure virtually overnight.

 

She has sold-out countless tours and concerts, including the Royal Albert Hall, The London Palladium and The MGM Grand in Las Vegas, and has released 10 studio albums, the most recent being Let The Light In.

 

Jane is a popular presenter for TV travel shows, including fronting the BAFTA Award-winning Channel 5 series Cruising with Jane McDonald, along with Jane & Friends, Holidaying With Jane McDonald and her most recent outing Jane McDonald: Lost In Japan.

 

Earlier this year Jane hosted the British Soap Awards and she has performed at three Royal Variety Performances."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-23T18:30:00.000Z"></span><span content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="MIKO EXPO is a world concert tour series with sub-events that allows fans of all backgrounds to celebrate the creative culture surrounding Hatsune Miku. 2024 marks the 10th anniversary of the MIKU EXPO tour.

 

Hatsune Miku is a music software developed by Crypton Future Media, INC., which enables anyone to make their computer sing by entering lyrics and melodies. As a massive number of users created music using the software and posted their works on the Internet, Hatsune Miku quickly evolved into a cultural phenomenon. Since then, Hatsune Miku has gained much attention as a character, involved in many fields such as merchandising and live performance as a virtual singer. Now her popularity has spread across the globe."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-26T19:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="DPR ARTIC

 

Joined DPR in 2019 and started to become known to fans with his DPR DJ performances starting with Head in the Clouds LA 2019. Later, in 2021, he co-produced the campaign video song "SYNC" for the SYNC PACK, a collaboration campaign with DPR and Adidas and the theme song "Set It Off" for the 2022 League of Legends Mid-Season Invitational (MSI). In 2024 he released his first album [KINEMA], an album which he not only produced, but also directed the overall concept.

 

DPR CREAM

 

DPR CREAM, a master of sound production and a key artist/producer of DPR is back with a new release.  His music is known to evoke unique emotions through a mixture of alternative and contemporary sounds, offering an expansive auditory experience.

With his previous single albums and track features in DPR ARCHIVES, he has built a wide audience of listeners worldwide, proving that his musical ability and artistic color is like no other.

 

DPR IAN

 

Christian Yu began composing and creating under the alias DPR IAN in late 2015 as one of the founding members of creative collective DPR ("Dream Perfect Regime") in Seoul, South Korea. The collective creates, directs, produces, and edits all types of multimedia projects for its diverse roster of talent, with DPR IAN serving as its chief director and editor. Known for his sharp artistic vision and tedious attention to detail, DPR IAN has emerged as a solo artist whose work blurs the lines of Pop, R&B, rock, and electronica to convey an atmospheric exploration of self-reflection and spirituality."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-27T20:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope forward to a musical highlight! The GENSHIN CONCERT TOUR is touring Europe and bringing its breathtaking concerts and performances to three of the largest metropolises and capitals: London, Berlin and Paris. Immerse yourself in the fascinating sound world of Genshin Impact and experience unforgettable moments in these vibrant cities.

INTRODUCTION OF GENSHIN CONCERT TOUR

A Traveler from afar steps into the fantasy world of Teyvat and sets off on an endless journey... Accompanied by soothing melodies, the Traveler must venture alongside the âwindâ of freedom in Mondstadt, discover the origin of âcontractsâ in Liyue, redress the concept of âeternityâ amidst a sea of red maple and thunderstorms in Inazuma, witness the rebirth of âwisdomâ where the rainforest and desert meet in Sumeru, arrive at The Terrestrial Sea, and encountered tales never- heard-of as well as forgotten legends in the nation that reveres "justice"... Melodies of an endless journey will resound across the world at the Genshin Concert in 2024 again. Travelers will have the chance to attend in person and â through the creative interpretations of globally renowned musicians â revisit wonderful moments from their journeys through Teyvat from a brand-new perspective."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-29T20:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope itemType="https://schema.org/Organization"><span itemProp="name" content="https://schema.org/EventScheduled"></span><span itemProp="eventAttendanceMode" content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="Black Veil Brides 

 

Before the birth of the BVB Army, the thousands of lyric tattoos, and the gold and platinum records that followed, Black Veil Brides was simply a dark vision dreamt up by an only child in Ohio.

 

He loved Batman and KISS. Then, the striking visage of Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, on the cover of his dadâs dusty CD (released a dozen years before he was born) kicked open the door for Andy Biersack. Sweeney Todd cleared the way for The Phantom of the Opera, Misfits, and all that followed, culminating in the birth of Andy Black and the ascension of Black Veil Brides.  

 

The Bleeders EP, Black Veil Bridesâ inaugural release in a new partnership with Spinefarm Records, celebrates one of the singerâs first loves. The EP boasts the title track alongside a loving rendition of Sweeney Toddâs âMy Friendsâ and a faithful cover of U2âs âSunday Bloody Sunday.â

 

The groupâs cinematic scope and unwavering commitment to self-expression strikes a familiar chord with their fellow âbleedersâ who seek refuge (and revenge) in the power of the dark and imagination.

 

There are over 160 million views of âKnives and Pens,â an early demo committed to music video before Andy (who moved to Hollywood at 18 and lived in his car) met his band of brothers. The RIAA-certified platinum single âIn the End,â itself close to 170M views, further proves the group whose merch dominated Hot Topic before theyâd even made their debut album was built to last.

 

A treacherous DIY headlining outing in 2009 paved the way for the next 15 years of performances and beyond, a history that includes the triple-co-headlining smash Trinity Of Terror Tour; multiple mainstage runs on Vans Warped Tour; treks supporting Avenged Sevenfold and MÃ¶tley CrÃ¼e; and just about every major rock and metal festival in North and South America, Europe, and Australia.

Guitarists Jake Pitts and Jinxx joined the fold before the creation of BVBâs debut album, 2010âs We Stitch These Wounds. The duo played in an earlier band with drummer Christian Coma, who came aboard for their first Billboard Top 20 album, Set the World on Fire, featuring gold single âFallen Angels.â Metalcore milestone Wretched and Divine: The Story of the Wild Ones followed in 2013.

 

A no-frills fourth album, 2014âs Black Veil Brides, gave them another Top 10 debut. 2018âs Vale went to No. 1 on Billboardâs Hard Rock chart. 2021âs The Phantom Tomorrow, the bandâs first album with bassist Lonny Eagleton, produced the No. 8 Rock single âScarlet Cross,â their highest charting yet.

 

Bleeders offers a taste of what will become Black Veil Brides' most visceral, theatrical, and unrelenting era yet. They combine a unique identity with an unquenchable creative thirst. Theyâre an object of devotion for those who sing their anthems in unison, a diverse BVB Army who never surrenders.

 

Black Veil Brides and their audience slash away at the darkness together, bleeders one and all."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-30T20:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content=""Looking back at the bandâs storied 27 year career, Sum 41 has firmly cemented their place in rock history with over 15 million records sold worldwide, multiple Billboard Charting releases, a Grammy Award nomination, 2 Juno Awards (7 nominations), a Kerrang! Award in 2002, multiple Alternative Press Music Awards, and countless other accolades."

 

Sum 41 never fit in. They didnât give a shit or try to either. Instead, they came out of the gate swinging with a signature style punctuated by pop punk singalongs and hard-hitting heavy metal proficiency. As a result, theyâve cast an unmatched shadow over popular culture, tracing back to their turn-of-the-century domination of TRL up to a rapturous set at the inaugural When We Were Young Festival. Within the span of a year, Iggy Pop tapped them for a collaboration, and they paid a fiery tribute to Metallica for MTV Icon. Their music has surged through major franchises, ranging from Spider-Man to American Pie and Bring It On. They ignited a triptych of classic albumsâthe platinum-certified All Killer No Filler [2001], gold-certified Does This Look Infected? [2002], and gold-certified Chuck [2004]âand persisted in their second decade with just as much piss and vinegar on the likes of 13 Voices [2016] and Order In Decline [2019]. Slant hailed the latter as âa hell of fun ride,â while GQ applauded how âthe band made it all the way back.â After selling 15 million albums worldwide, garnering two Juno Awards, a Kerrang! Award, and a handful of Alternative Press Music Awards, receiving a GRAMMYÂ® nomination, and packing venues everywhere, theyâre going out with a bangâand on their own terms. Disregarding the rules, ignoring expectations, and following their instincts once again, the bandâDeryck Whibley [vocals, guitar], Dave Baksh [guitar], Jason McCaslin [bass], Tom Thacker [guitar], and Frank Zummo [drums]âdeliver a fittingly fiery final statement in the form of the double-LP, Heaven :x: Hell [Rise Records]. Heaven is 10 tracks of snarling high energy pop punk, while Hell consists of ten heavy metal anthems spiked with fret-burning solos, thrashing riffs, and fist-pumping hooks. Itâs big, itâs ballsy, and itâs their boldest and best body of work to date."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-10-31T20:00:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope of the UK and Europe since 2017, with 27 shows across 17 countries this Autumn. The band are widely regarded as one of the greatest live acts in the world today, and these shows promise to be some of the most hotly anticipated of 2024.

 

Kicking off on 24th September in Oberhausen, Germany and ending in Paris, France on 17th November, the dates also take in 6 shows across the UK. The tour will follow the release of their 18th studio album âWild Godâ on 30th August. 

 

âI never think about how a record is going to go live, it never, ever occurs to me. The lyric writing process is way too hard to take ideas like that into consideration.  But, when I listen to âWild Godâ now, I think we can really do something epic with these songs live. Weâre really excited about that - the record just feels like it was made for the stage.â Nick Cave"></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-11-03T19:30:00.000Z"></span><span Paddy McGuinness is a much-loved presence on British TV, from his legendary acting roles in Phoenix Nights, Max and Paddy and The Keith and Paddy Picture Show to presenting prime time TV shows such as Take Me Out and BBC's Top Gear, as well as having sold out hundreds of venues across the country on his stand-up tours. In 2021 Paddy releases his acclaimed autobiography My Lifey. NowPaddy is raring to get back to where he belongs â onstage, making people laugh, with his hotly anticipated show.

Paddy said:âItâs been eight years since my last tour and thereâs lots of things to laugh about! âTalk On Cornersâ in November 2024. Performing tracks from the acclaimed album plus a selection of their greatest hits to fans all over the United Kingdom & Ireland.

The tour announcement follows news that the band â whose biggest hits include Runaway, What Can I Do? And Breathless â are planning a first-ever vinyl release of their second studio album âTalk On Cornersâ, with more details to come.


One of Australiaâs most loved pop artists, Natalie Imbruglia will join The Corrs across all UK & Ireland tour dates. content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="Janey Godley - Why is She Still Here? 2024 Tour

 

Against all odds and filled with heaps of chemo Janey Godley returns this Autumn.

 

Controversy, cancellation, and cancer donât always make the best comedy but in Janeyâs hands this will be a dynamite of a gig.

 

The funny Scottish woman behind the voiceovers of Nicola Sturgeon during covid, is back on tour celebrating winning âThe Billy Connolly, Spirit of Glasgow Comedy Awardâ.

 

Her feet are numb, and she has a lumpy hernia because of the cancer treatment, but she keeps going!

 

âI canât believe Iâm still aliveâ she says as many horrid trolls on twitter claim sheâs faking cancer âif I was going to fake something it would have been the orgasms I keep having when I realise, theyâre obsessed with me!â - Janey

 

Voiceovers, comedy, and outrageous stories are on the menu. Donât miss it. Book now!

 

âItâs one of those gigs, finally, that feels as much communion as comedy, as Godleyâs audience seize the chance to see her and share in her stories.â - Guardian

 

âThe type of act you want to catch again and again, year after yearâ - (One4Review)"></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-11-17T19:30:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope a brand-new tour for 2024 celebrating all the greatest hits of Pink Floyd.

With over 30 years of history as the worldâs biggest, best and greatest Pink Floyd tribute show, TAPFS will also once again bring state of the art lighting & video, pinpoint lasers, gargantuan inflatables and flawless live sound to deliver a memorable live experience that was the benchmark of Pink Floyd shows.

TAPFSâs dedication to the heritage of Barrett, Waters, Gilmour, Wright & Mason has seen them selling over four million tickets across 35 countries. TAPFS is the leading show of its kind in the world and is rightfully hailed as one of the most in demand touring entities currently operating. Performing the music of Pink Floyd with note for note perfection, this critically acclaimed show has been astonishing audiences worldwide for more than three decades.

TAPFS constantly strive to seek out new audiences and turn in jaw-dropping performances to reconnect people with the music that they love.  The Australian Pink Floyd Show are currently in the midst of a massive sold out UK tour celebrating the 50th Anniversary of Dark Side Of the Moon.  Next year will bring more innovation, hard work, and great crowds - demonstrating that it is still all about the great music of Pink Floyd and delivering the absolute best performance each and every night."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-11-22T19:30:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope itemType="https://schema.org/Organization"><span itemProp="name" content="OVO content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="Critically-acclaimed musician and songwriter Jamie Cullum has announced a new UK headline tour for this November.

 

News of the tour comes after Jamie made his multi-million selling, 2003 album Twentysomething available on vinyl for the very first time last October. The re-issue came exactly 20 years after it was first released (20th October 2003) and still holds the honour of being the fastest selling jazz album in chart history, with its sales in 2003 leading to Jamie being the UKâs highest selling jazz artist in history.

 

With over 10 million album sales to date and his successful BBC Radio 2 show, Jamie Cullum is globally celebrated, meeting loyal fans wherever he goes. His legendary live shows have seen him work alongside artists as diverse as Herbie Hancock , Pharrell Williams, Kendrick Lamar and Lang Lang, whilst the success of his major label breakthrough, Twentysomething and its follow up Catching Tales saw him nominated for a BRIT, Grammy and numerous other awards around the world. He recently won the Ivor Novello award for best song musically and lyrically for his song âThe Age of Anxietyâ from his critically acclaimed album Taller.

 

In addition to his enduringly successful recording career, he has also established himself as a multi-award winning music broadcaster. He approaches all aspects of his career, as he has from the beginning, as both a fan and a student with seemingly boundless creativity and enthusiasm."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="Jason Manford is back with a new live show for 2024/5 - A Manford All Seasons. Kicking off on 10th November 2024 at Derby Arena, Jason will then play 17 shows at some of the UKâs biggest entertainment venues.

 

Jasonâs last stand-up show, Like Me, saw him play an incredible 280 shows across the country, receiving standing ovations and rave reviews night after night. A Manford All Seasons is Jasonâs latest comic offering that will feature his iconic âexpert observational comedyâ (The Guardian) and is sure to be âcomic goldâ (Mail on Sunday).

 

Jason said: âPeople ask me what my favourite job is, acting, presenting, musicals etc. I love them all, but my favourite is still the privilege of doing a stand-up comedy. Itâs just me, you, a microphone and a cracking venue. No cameras, no director, no viewing figures and no OFCOM! I canât wait to see you again and have a good laugh at this mad world, it feels like it's been ages.â

 

Salford-born Jason Manford is one of the UKâs leading multi-talented performers, with a career also spanning acting, presenting, and singing on both stage and screen.

 

Away from comedy, Jason has hosted many shows for the BBC and ITV including Unbeatable, Sunday Night at The Palladium, and The Royal Variety Performance.  Earlier this year, he returned to judge the second series of ITV1's Saturday night show Starstruck and hosted BBC One's primetime show Big Night of Musicals for the second time. Jason also hosts his award-winning three-hour show every Sunday on Absolute Radio.

 

His other TV credits include: First & Last (BBC One), The Masked Singer (ITV1), What Would Your Kid Do? (ITV1), Scarborough (BBC One), 8 Out of 10 Cats (Channel 4), The Nightly Show (ITV1), Live at the Apollo (BBC One), Have I Got News For You (BBC One) and QI (BBC Two).

 

On stage, Jason has starred in numerous musicals in the West End and across the UK, including Sweeney Todd, The Producers, Chitty Chitty Bang Bang, Guys and Dolls, and Curtains. This summer he starred as the Cowardly Lion in The Wizard of Oz at The London Palladium."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-11-25T19:30:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope itemType="https://schema.org/Organization"><span itemProp="name" content="SEC Armadillo"></span><span itemProp="url" content="https://www.sec.co.uk/sec-armadillo-auditorium"></span></span></li><li content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="2023 saw a remarkable ascension for the enigmatic phenomenon known as Sleep Token. Unconstrained by genre, the innovative third album âTake Me Back To Edenâ saw the band melding post rock, post classical and post metal tropes with soulful vocals, and delivering a sonic landscape like no one else. The album achieved new chart peaks across the world - including #3 in the UK and #16 in the US â and contributed to their 85+ million career streams to date.

 

Now Sleep Token again raise the bar with the confirmation of their biggest UK arena tour to date in November. Representing the UK leg of âThe Teeth of Godâ world tour, the five rituals will see them play to a total of more than 75,000 fans including Londonâs O2 Arena on November 29th.

 

In the meantime, Sleep Token are set to tour Australia in April before embarking upon a huge North American tour later that month (with support from Empire State B*stard), which instantly sold-out."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-11-25T19:30:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope itemType="https://schema.org/Organization"><span itemProp="name" content="OVO content="https://schema.org/OfflineEventAttendanceMode"></span><span itemProp="description" content="DJ, broadcaster and global dance music legend Pete Tong has announced that his critically acclaimed Ibiza Classics will return for a brand-new show in winter 2024. He will once again be joined by long time collaborator Jules Buckley and The Essential Orchestra.

Special guest vocalists will be announced in the new year.

Ibiza Classics has firmly cemented itself as part of the live music calendar becoming the world's most iconic orchestral electronic music event. Celebrating the legacy of dance music, the new live show will include a host of special guest DJs and singers showcasing stunning reimagines of timeless classic house tracks. Combining unique orchestration with unparalleled electronic production, ravers rejoice as it is set to be the party of the year reminiscent of the White Isle and its musical history!
 
A pillar of dance music with an unparalleled ear for new talent, Pete Tong MBE is undeniably one of the worldâs most influential figures. Over the last three decades - both publicly and behind the scenes - Pete has been revered as an arena-selling artist, DJ, music producer, A&R, and the voice of Radio 1âs prestigious dance programming. With an incredible 30+ year career, the tastemaker DJ, broadcaster and producer has been dedicated to making dance music a global genre, constantly pushing boundaries, and breaking new talent wherever he goes. A testament to his life spent in music year, Pete Tong MBE was honoured with the prestigious Music Industry Trusts Award (MITS) in 2021 for recognition of his outstanding contribution to the music and broadcast industries. This year Pete Tongâ Ibiza Classics took part in celebratory Coronation Concert in the grounds of Windsor Castle (watch some of the incredible performance here) and completed another sell out Ibiza Classics arena tour."></span><span itemProp="endDate" content="2024-12-05T19:30:00.000Z"></span><span itemProp="organizer" itemScope itemType="https://schema.org/Organization"><span itemProp="name"
